<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_peers","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing peer list","required":["peers"],"properties":{"peers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["ip_addr","port","peak_height","user_managed"],"properties":{"ip_addr":{"type":"string"},"peak_height":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0},"port":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0},"user_managed":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"PeerRecord"},"description":"List of connected peers"}},"title":"GetPeersResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
